subject: Speed Skating
lead_paragraph: The Dutch speedskater Sven Kramer shattered the world record in the 5,000 meters yesterday, knocking more than four seconds off the mark in a World Cup event. Kramer finished in 6 minutes 3.32 seconds in Calgary, Alberta.
snippet: The Dutch speedskater Sven Kramer shattered the world record in the 5,000 meters yesterday, knocking more than four seconds off the mark in a World Cup event. Kramer finished in 6 minutes 3.32 seconds in Calgary, Alberta.
